item.title: {We released OpenProject 10.5}
item.description: OpenProject 10.5 with agile team boards, new sorting of versions, and much more We have been working busily on the new features and improvements for OpenProject and are now proud to announce the release of OpenProject 10.5.The new team boards allow to create agile boards with lists for individual users or groups. The assigned person is automatically updated when boards are moved between the lists. This allows for very easy and transparent prioritization of tasks and workload dis...
